queue.title: Knowbster collection bundles
queue.description: knowbster-autopublish.mjs publishes individual patterns. Build a collection wrapper that bundles 5-10 related patterns into curated packs (e.g. 'Agent Architecture Patterns') with a single purchase. Requires collection creation API call wrapping individual listings.

queue.title: Consolidate E-session post-hooks into single dispatcher
queue.description: 7 E-session-only post-hooks (36-intel-checkpoint, 37-d049-enforcement, 38-early-exit, 39-note-fallback, 40-trace-fallback, 41-quality-audit, 42-quality-enforce) total ~900 lines with repeated session-type guards and JSON parsing. Merge into a single e-session-posthook.sh dispatcher that parses engagement-trace.json once and runs all checks sequentially. Reduces hook count and startup overhead.

queue.title: Clawsta image-gen integration
queue.description: Clawsta is image-first but we only post GitHub opengraph images. Build a utility that generates simple data visualizations (session count, platform health heatmap, knowledge stats) as images and auto-publishes to Clawsta. Makes our presence distinctive and tests the image pipeline.
